name: Boba Cat
description: Boba Cat is a meme token on Ethereum, inspired by Dogecoin founder Billy Marcusâ€™s cat, Boba. The project combines crypto culture with a mission to support global animal welfare. By using $BOBA, the community funds shelters and charitable initiatives, proving that meme tokens can create real impact while still being fun, community-driven, and rooted in internet culture. Over time, Boba Cat has grown into a philanthropic movement, partnering with shelters worldwide and hosting events that connect online communities with real-world impact. Its vision is to show that meme tokens can sustain both cultural relevance and meaningful social contribution.
